title: Fast and Easy Turkey Pot Pie

Ingredients.1: 1 (14.1 ounce) package pastry for 9-inch double-crust pie

Ingredients.3: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables, thawed and drained

Ingredients.4: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line an 8-inch pie dish with one of the pastry crusts; set the other crust aside.

Directions.2: Combine turkey, mixed vegetables, condensed soup, Cheddar cheese, seasoned salt, and seasoned pepper in a bowl; mix until well combined. Pour mixture into the bottom crust.

Directions.3: Place the second pie crust over the filling; pinch and fold the edges of both crusts together to seal. Use a sharp knife to cut one or two slits in the top pie crust to allow the steam to vent as the pie cooks.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbling, about 40 minutes.
